descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: collections
options.description: The collections to assign to this member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: externalId
options.description: The external identifier to set to this member

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filters.name: filters

options.name: actingUserId
options.description: The unique identifier of the acting user

options.name: end
options.description: The end date for the search

options.name: itemID
options.description: The unique identifier of the item that the event describes

options.name: start
options.description: The start date for the search

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the group to create
name.ai_hint: The name of the group to create

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: collections
options.description: The collections to assign to this member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: externalId
options.description: The external identifier to set to this member

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

memberIds.name: memberIds
memberIds.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of members to set in a group
memberIds.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of IDs of members to set in a group

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the member to update
email.ai_hint: The email of the member to update

groupIds.name: groupIds
groupIds.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of groups to set for a member
groupIds.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of IDs of groups to set for a member

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'collection' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "getMembers", "update", "updateMembers"] THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'accessAll'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'group' AND operation == 'updateMembers' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberIds'
IF resource == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "getGroups", "update", "updateGroups"] THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'accessAll'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'updateGroups' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupIds'
